title: Principles of Research
description: Interdisciplinary approach to research combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Fundamentals of Workshop
description: Comprehensive study of workshop with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Applied Practice
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in practice. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Applied Seminar
description: Interdisciplinary approach to seminar combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Practice
description: Interdisciplinary approach to practice combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Advanced Research
description: Comprehensive study of research with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Workshop
description: In-depth analysis of workshop principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Special Topics in Workshop
description: Rigorous treatment of workshop theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

description: Comprehensive study of applications with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.
prerequisites: RELI 394 and senior standing or graduate status

prerequisites: RELI 321 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Research
description: Interdisciplinary approach to research combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.
